name: Hawaii
description: Hawaii is a beautiful, tropical island. It's rich in culture, scenery, and its tropical climate.

name: Puerto Rico
description: Puerto Rico is a small, yet very special island in the Carribean. It blends Spanish and African cultures, making it a strong island and beautiful to tourists around the world.

name: South Korea
description: South Korea, a country that's known for blending ancient traditions with its fast-paced technological advancements. Also well-known for its most famous genre, K-Pop (Korean Pop), many enjoy seeing the culture and landscape.

name: Japan
description: Another country known for including its ancient traditions with cutting-edge tech, Japan is well-known for its amazing food, beautiful scenery, and making itself known throughout the world. This can be seen in tech, culture, video games, anime, and more.

name: Canada
description: Canada's landscapes are breathtakingly beautiful. From the majestic Niagra Falls to the Canadian Rockies, many are stunned with the country's welcoming beauty.

name: Italy
description: Italy is known for its amazing foods, and even more amazing views! Can you imagine having a beautiful dinner with a breathtaking view of the Italian cities, then be able to see art pieces from the Renaissance era?

name: Germany
description: Germany, a country in Europe, is well-known for combining its rich history with modern innovations. A favorite sight amongst tourists is the Cologne Cathedral, and who could blame them? It's magnificent!

name: Thailand
description: Also known as the Land of Smiles for the kindess of its natives, Thailand offers beautiful energy and amazing cuisines.

name: Scotland
description: Scotland introduces great views no other could prepare for. Its castles and mountains are some of the best you could see.

name: Iceland
description: Iceland offers landscapes that are otherwordly. From glaciers to the Northern Lights, the Icelandic nation is like no other.
